Ship
Ship

Class representing ships.

Variables
row
char row

Ship's bow y coordinate.

col
char col

Ship's bow x coordinate.

size
char size

Ship's size.

hits
char hits

Counts how many times ship has been hit.

verticalDir
bool verticalDir

Describes ship's alligment: true ‐ alligned vertically (downwards from bow coordinates); false ‐ horizontally (to the right from bow coordinates).

Functions
Ship
Ship(
char _row,
char _col,
char _size,
bool _verticalDir
) : row(_row), col(_col), size(_size), verticalDir(_verticalDir), hits(0)

Initializes the object.

hasBeenSunk
bool hasBeenSunk()

Checks wether ship has been sunk (hits == size).

Returns
True

ship has been sunk,

False

ship has not been sunk.

hit
void hit()

Increments hits counter

cell
cell

Represents one cell of a Sea.

Variables
ship
Ship * ship

Pointer to a Ship that occupies that cell.

hasBeenShotAt
bool hasBeenShotAt

Flag set to true if cell has already been shot at and set to false if it has not been shot at yet.

Sea
Sea

Playing board.

Variables
cells
cell cells[10][10]

Building block of a Sea. Each sea consists of 10x10 cells.

Functions
placeShip
void placeShip(
Ship * ship
)

Places Ships on the Sea.

Parameters
Ship
Ship*

a Ship to be placed on the Sea.

displayBoard
void displayBoard(
bool showShips
)

Dispalys playing board (Sea) with shot marking and optionally ship placement.

Parameters
showShips
bool

parameter saying wether ship placement should be visible (true) or not (false).

markCellsAroundSunkenShip
void markCellsAroundSunkenShip(
char row,
char col,
char size,
bool verticalDir
)

Marks cells around sunken Ship as "shot at" (hasBeenShotAt = true).

Parameters
row
char

y coordinate of ship's bow,

col
char

x coordinate of ship's bow,

size
char

size fo the ship,

verticalDir
bool

orientation of the ship; true means it is alligned vertically on the grid, false horizontally.

See Also

cell

shootAtCoords
char shootAtCoords(
char row,
char col,
char *shipSize = nullptr
)

Shoots at given coordinate. Marks given cell as "shot at", and informs about shot's success or failure.

Parameters
row
char

y coordinate of ship's bow,

col
char

x coordinate of ship's bow,

shipSize
char*

optional parameter, informs AI about Ship size, so it can flag cells around the Ship as invalid after sinking it.

Returns
-1

if cell has already been shot at (is invalid),

0

if shot missed,

1

if shot hit,

2

if shot hit, and the Ship has sunk.

See Also

AI cell
